Actions.Name: Slime Stream
Actions.Effects: Shove all characters 2 spaces in the direction of the line.

Actions.Name: Floating Toxin
Actions.Description: The fish shoots a spiny dart into the bloodstream of a character in range 6, marking them.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the character has flying, cannot benefit from sturdy, and is shoved 2 in a random direction at the end of their turns. Roll 1d6 for the direction, relative to the map (1: fish chooses, 2: up, 3: down, 4: left, 5: right, 6: character chooses). A character can save against this mark after being shoved, ending it on a success.

Actions.Name: Pearlescent Bubble
Actions.Description: The fish spits out three bubbles in range 4.

Summons.Name: Pearlescent Bubble
Summons.SummonEffects: When a character collides with the bubble, it pops, shattering them, shoving them 3 in any direction, and creating a space of difficult terrain. Shattered characters are stunned.
